snippet.title: Virtue's Last Reward (3DS and VITA) Trailer
snippet.description:
Virtue's Last Reward -- Follow-up to 2010's award-winning puzzle adventure Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors. Virtue's Last Reward is full of conspiracies, huge plot twists, amazing characters, and so much more. With multiple different possible endings Virtue's last reward will continue to thrill and surprise right to the finish.

Will you choose to ally...or to betray?

Visit Rising Star Games
http://www.risingstargames.com

Twitter
http://www.twitter.com/RisingStarGames
